    Need more Info

    Please consider reading some of these before contacting us for
    further help!

    • Where can I get more information on Monstercat Gold?

      You can get more info about our Gold Program here.

    • Where can I get music for my YouTube/Twitch channel?

      You can sign up for our Gold Program here if you are a content creator. For commercial usage please visit our partners page.

    • Sync and Partnership Info and Inquiry

      Please visit our partners page for more information about commercial licensing and sync information.

    • I’m having payment issues with my Gold membership.

      Please contact Xsolla support here for any payment issues or requesting a refund.

    • I’m having issues with my user login.

      Please try our forgot password functionality before contacting support. Thank you.
